name: Jewish American Heritage Month
description: Annual recognition and celebration of American Jews' achievements and contributions to the United States of America.

name: Indigenous People's Heritage Month
description: Honoring and celebrating the culture, traditions, and customs of Indigenous Peoples.

name: International Holocaust Remembrance Day
description: Commemorating the victims of the Holocaust.

name: National Hispanic Heritage Month
description: Recognizing the contributions and influence of Hispanic culture to the nation's achievements, culture, and history.

name: Women's History Month
description: Highlighting the contributions of women to events in history and contemporary society.

name: Pride Month
description: Celebration of LGBTQ pride, commemorating the contributions of LGBTQ culture and community.

name: Black History Month
description: Remembering important people and events in the history of the African diaspora.
